content.question: A. Explain ONE economic reason why a recently established community might have a population structure for people over the age of 55 as shown in the pyramid. B. Describe ONE environmental pull factor that would draw migrants from long distances to the location shown in the pyramid. C. Explain ONE reason why the female population aged 65 and over can be significantly larger than the male population over age 65. D. Explain the degree to which the population pyramid shown can be used to predict local needs for health care facilities.
